casebody.data:
LASSITER, ex rel.
v.
NORTH CAROLINA BAPTIST HOSPITALS, INCORPORATED, et al. No. 330PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 5, 2015. Charles F. Carpenter, Tracy K. Lischer, Durham, Sharron R. Edwards, Joseph T. Edwards, Greenville, for Lassiter, Keen, et al. Richard L. Vanore, Norman F. Klick, Jr.Robert N. Young, Greensboro, for Daniel, Terry (M.D.), et al. Linda L. Helms, G. Gray Wilson, Winston-Salem, for North Carolina Baptist Hospital, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of August 2015 by Plaintiff to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of August 2015."
